text: The 1979–80 Thorn EMI Rugby Union County Championship was the 80th edition of England's County Championship rugby union club competition. Lancashire won their 11th title after defeating Gloucestershire in the final. == First Round == {|class="wikitable" style="font-size: 100%" |- !width=20| Pos !width=250| Northern Division !width=20| P
